tokens.resolved_gloss: used very widely as demonstrative, lo!; interrogative, whether?; or conditional, if, although; also Oh that!, when; hence, as a negative, not

tokens.resolved_gloss: gold, figuratively, something gold-colored (i.e. yellow), as oil, a clear sky

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, fatness, i.e. by implication (literally) the loin (as the seat of the leaf fat) or (generally) the viscera; also (figuratively) silliness or (in a good sense) trust
